title: Calories in Starbucks Syrup
meta_description: Discover calories in syrup starbucks per pump, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition details for your coffee drinks.
assumptions: Standard flavored syrup (e.g., vanilla), 1 pump = 1/4 oz (7.5 ml); no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and pump size; sugar-free options differ. Check Starbucks app or labels.

quick_answer.text: One pump of Starbucks syrup adds 20 calories, mostly from sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one pump of Starbucks syrup?
faqs.a: About 20 calories per pump of standard flavored syrup.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Starbucks syrup?
faqs.a: Yes, 5 g carbs per pump, all from sugars.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories for sugar-free Starbucks syrup?
faqs.a: Sugar-free versions have 0 calories per pump.

faqs.q: How much syrup is in a Starbucks pump?
faqs.a: One pump is typically 1/4 oz or 7.5 ml.

faqs.q: Does syrup flavor affect calories in Starbucks drinks?
faqs.a: Most flavors are 20 kcal per pump, but some like pumpkin spice may vary slightly.
